name: Devices Mod
summary: A Minecraft mod that adds working electronic devices.

name: Advanced Debug
summary: Advanced debug utilities and information for Minecraft.

name: Master Weapons
summary: Adds overpowered weapons and tools to Minecraft.

name: Exit Confirmation
summary: Shows an exit confirmation screen when trying to close Minecraft.

name: Small Utilities
summary: Adding functional/decorational blocks to your Minecraft world.

name: Dark Server Console
summary: A mod that themes Minecraft's Dedicated server console.

name: Random Thingz
summary: Probably just another random things mod for Minecraft.

name: Ultimate Essentials
summary: The ultimate server essentials mod, that uses GUI and keybinds instead of commands.

name: MineChromatic
summary: Adds a webbrowser app to Ultreon Devices Mod

name: ControllerX
summary: A controller mod for Minecraft, with a bunch of new features such as on screen keyboard.

name: Materialistic Tools
summary: Adds new tools and items for Minecraft with real and fictional materials.

name: Ultracraft Networking
summary: An Ultracraft mod adding improved networking API for mods.

name: Ultracraft
summary: A WIP voxel game aiming to do things differently.

name: Bubble Blaster 2
summary: A bubble game taken to the next level.

name: Notepad Improved
summary: Different take on a notepad app.

name: Ultreon Browser
summary: A simple webbrowser made in Kotlin using JCEF.
